location: Jihe Road, Shilin District - 195m from Children's Amusement Park MRT Station
notes: 2BR/2BA unit on 8F with elevator, well-equipped with appliances and furniture. Close to MRT (195m) which is convenient for families. Note: no pets allowed and some furnishings may change - verify condition during viewing. The listing lacks photos to assess baby safety features like balcony railings, but the 8th floor balcony would require childproofing. Additional NT$4000/month management fee brings total to NT$63,500.
